question: 涼しい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>cool</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>cool</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>refreshing</vocabulary>).
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you want to experience a place that is <vocabulary>cool</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>refreshing</vocabulary> go to <reading>Sue</reading>'s <reading>Zoo</reading> (<ja>すず</ja>). Imagine yourself walking into the entrance of Sue's Zoo. Then walk in and feel how cool and refreshing it is.
